guide.introduction: I started making blades in ninth grade i made two machetes so far.
guide.introduction_rendered: I started making blades in ninth grade i made two machetes so far.
guide.summary: I want to start a knife company that also makes tomahawks and machetes. All blades are hand made until i can afford some equipment and better materials.
